starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
Both players look up each other's noses
starts.extra: Also, describe boogers like an avid archeologist

examples.title: Both players trade your silliest fart joke
examples.extra: Add a homemade sound effect on each punchline

examples.title: Both players speak only in kid voices for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Introduce yourselves like it's the first day of school

examples.title: Both players walk like dinosaurs side‑by‑side
examples.extra: End with a synchronized roar

examples.title: Both players play 'floor is lava' and jump to a safe spot together
examples.extra: Hold hands on the safe spot for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players hopscotch along imaginary squares
examples.extra: High‑five each other at the end

examples.title: Both players hide under a blanket for 7 seconds and whisper goofy secrets
examples.extra: Hold hands while you whisper

examples.title: Both players play 'Simon Says' with ultra‑silly commands
examples.extra: Switch leaders and out‑silly each other

examples.title: Both players air‑draw mustaches on yourselves
examples.extra: Air‑draw a dot on each other's cheek

examples.title: Both players swap the goofiest accessories you can find
examples.extra: Wear them for the rest of this round

examples.title: Both players build a tiny pillow‑fort doorway together
examples.extra: Crawl through it together like secret agents

examples.title: Both players do silly walks side‑by‑side for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Mirror each other's silliest move at the end

examples.title: Both players play a gentle hat keep‑away
examples.extra: Freeze in a goofy pose when the hat changes hands

examples.title: Both players do a two‑person conga line of just you two
examples.extra: Add a quick back‑hug for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players spin in place then stabilize each other
examples.extra: Finish with a steadying embrace for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players choreograph a 10‑second cartoon dance
examples.extra: Repeat the last move a little closer together

examples.title: Both players tell the worst knock‑knock joke you know
examples.extra: Step one foot closer to each other before the punchline

examples.title: Both players pretend to burp the alphabet (no real burps needed)
examples.extra: Finish with a dramatic bow or curtsy

examples.title: Both players act out a scene from a kids' show
examples.extra: Add a shoulder‑bump celebration at the end

examples.title: Both players sit back‑to‑back and try to stand up together
examples.extra: Repeat once faster

examples.title: Both players hop while holding both hands
examples.extra: Do one slow spin together at the end

examples.title: Both players play freeze‑tag with just the two of you
examples.extra: Add a 3‑second 'meltdown' unfreeze

examples.title: Both players talk like robots for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Gently beep each other's nose at the end

examples.title: Both players do the pat‑head/rub‑belly challenge
examples.extra: Switch hands and try again

examples.title: Both players do the chicken dance facing each other
examples.extra: Add a quick cheek‑to‑cheek pose for 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players wear each other's small accessory briefly
examples.extra: Swap back with eyes closed

examples.title: Both players create a secret handshake with 6 moves
examples.extra: Add a stomp at the end

examples.title: Both players pretend to be puppets and take turns 'controlling' each other
examples.extra: Play the last 3 seconds very close together

examples.title: Both players lip‑sync a silly duet
examples.extra: Lean in close on the last word

examples.title: Both players slow‑dance like it's middle school (arms wide)
examples.extra: Cheek‑to‑cheek for 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players do a safe piggyback‑pose lean
examples.extra: Switch positions and repeat
